Text:
Hmm... I'm running Chrome and having it default back to dogpile.... 

That said I have not figured out a way of overriding the tab behavior in Chrome which brings up either your Chrome installed apps (as it runs as a kind of mini os) or history ( as does Firefox these days).... Both such a good idea but no biggie.

Only go google where I need to but avoid their search engine pages religiously!
Maybe Im being dim but what is the point of posting a piece of freely available freeware software here...
12.15 is already available for free from Opera.
